verses.roman:
ataeva tumi hao mūla nārāyaṇa
ei eka hetu, śuna dvitīya kāraṇa

synonyms: ataeva—therefore; tumi—You; hao—are; mūla—original; nārāyaṇa—Nārāyaṇa; ei—this; eka—one; hetu—reason; śuna—please listen; dvitīya—second; kāraṇa—to the reason.
translation: "You are therefore the original Nārāyaṇa. This is one reason; please listen as I state the second.
